question: You have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour.Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letterintroduce yourselfdescribe your plans for the partyinvite your neighbour to comeYou do NOT need to write any address
text: I am Hafiz Mahmood Hussain and I have been living in your neighbour for 3 years. I am writing this letter to inform and invite you to a party which will be held in my home. I am moving to a new house and want to give a dinner party to my old neighbour.

First of all, I am happy that my dream of buying a lavish house has been completed. Therefore, I planned to arrange dinner for my friends and some of my neighbours. Furthermore, I want to tell you, we will hold a music competition where I and my colleagues will perform. It is just for entertainment and of course music and people noise will reach your house. Therefore, I am sorry in advance for this disturbance in your sleeping.

Secondly, as you are my neighbour and we have had a good relationship throughout the living duration. It is my humble request that you join us and celebrate with us. Your presence will very important for me. We will wait for you and your family.
